isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 2000 4000 and 8000 MODELS BUILT OCTOBER 1, 1998 AND AFTER - ALLISON 2000 SERIES™ (LCT) TRANSMISSION ELECTRONIC CONTROLS - DESCRIPTION - CHECK TRANSMISSION LIGHT

svcproc.title: CHECK TRANSMISSION LIGHT
svcproc.para: The CHECK TRANSMISSION light is located in the instrument cluster. The light will come on while the vehicle is starting and will go out three seconds after the vehicle is started. The light will remain lit if a fault in the transmission or vehicle circuits to the transmission is detected by the TCM.

note.para: The CHECK TRANSMISSION light may indicate a problem in International® vehicle circuits related to the transmission or Allison 2000 Series™ transmission components. Insure the problem is not in International vehicle circuits before sending the vehicle to an Allison service center for repair.
